generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, on which multiple vehicles are driving or parked.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, with pedestrians and bicycles present, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background, including modern and older architectural styles.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings.
- person: Several people are visible, including pedestrians on the sidewalk and a person riding a bicycle.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides.
- truck: A white truck with a blue cargo container is visible on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk, and one is being ridden by a person.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting streetlights and signs.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the road.
